projects.name: Easeneura
projects.description: EaseNeura is a Flutter application designed to help individuals seeking consultation with mental health specialists and to support users in managing their own mental health.

projects.name: Illegal Maritime Activities Monitoring System
projects.description: Welcome to the Illegal Maritime Activities Monitoring System, a webapp designed to track and manage illegal maritime activities across Indonesian EEZs. This system leverages GLobal Fishing Watch API to provide almost real-time data analytics and monitoring capabilities, ensuring maritime security and compliance with international regulations.
